title: 4 Weeks Off on All Floor Plans with 12 Month Lease
posting_body: For leasing info call or text

Nestled in the heart of Houston’s poshest submarket, this community puts you at the center of the action with high-end shopping, five-star dining and to-die-for nightlife minutes away and the Buffalo Bayou recreation area in your backyard.
Flexible work-well spaces to fit any need from micro-offices, individual workspaces, conference tables, conference room, and grand meeting spaces all for reservation 24-hours a day
Breathtaking swimming pool with a fabulous tanning deck and an astounding resort atmosphere
Expansive outdoor entertainment space complete with grilling stations, generous seating and a stunning gathering terrace

24/7 Fitness Center and Lifestyle Studio encompassing a yoga room outfitted with superior Precor cardio theater featuring touch-screen television and tech connectivity; exceptional Precor weight and individual free weight stations and uncompromising conditioning equipment, including ABS Tire Flip, Escape Quad, Medicine Balls and Slam Balls
Clubroom with plush seating, televisions, bar area and game space complete with Golden Tee, billiard table, shuffleboard, & more; a fashionable Speakeasy space tops it all off
Exceptionally furnished sky lounge for relaxing and savoring the awe-inspiring views of Houston’s skyline
